response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its intrinsic value to be well above $800,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $750,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial advantage over competitors while ensuring a quick return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further.", "product_price": 750000}
